body:
Hello @stevemontana1980! Thanks for updating the PR.

 - In the file [`pandas/core/resample.py`](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/5f044e9c86db584a4aba7f7ac8fadc8074ac5c90/pandas/core/resample.py), following are the PEP8 issues :

> [Line 1118:9](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/5f044e9c86db584a4aba7f7ac8fadc8074ac5c90/pandas/core/resample.py#L1118): [E741](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E741) ambiguous variable name 'l'



 - In the file [`pandas/tests/test_resample.py`](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/5f044e9c86db584a4aba7f7ac8fadc8074ac5c90/pandas/tests/test_resample.py), following are the PEP8 issues :

> [Line 857:5](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/5f044e9c86db584a4aba7f7ac8fadc8074ac5c90/pandas/tests/test_resample.py#L857): [E731](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E731) do not assign a lambda expression, use a def
> [Line 1558:9](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/5f044e9c86db584a4aba7f7ac8fadc8074ac5c90/pandas/tests/test_resample.py#L1558): [E731](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E731) do not assign a lambda expression, use a def
> [Line 2197:5](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/5f044e9c86db584a4aba7f7ac8fadc8074ac5c90/pandas/tests/test_resample.py#L2197): [E731](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E731) do not assign a lambda expression, use a def
> [Line 2799:5](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/5f044e9c86db584a4aba7f7ac8fadc8074ac5c90/pandas/tests/test_resample.py#L2799): [E731](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E731) do not assign a lambda expression, use a def
> [Line 2870:9](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/5f044e9c86db584a4aba7f7ac8fadc8074ac5c90/pandas/tests/test_resample.py#L2870): [E731](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E731) do not assign a lambda expression, use a def
> [Line 2881:9](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/5f044e9c86db584a4aba7f7ac8fadc8074ac5c90/pandas/tests/test_resample.py#L2881): [E731](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E731) do not assign a lambda expression, use a def
> [Line 3043:9](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/5f044e9c86db584a4aba7f7ac8fadc8074ac5c90/pandas/tests/test_resample.py#L3043): [E731](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E731) do not assign a lambda expression, use a def
> [Line 3085:9](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/5f044e9c86db584a4aba7f7ac8fadc8074ac5c90/pandas/tests/test_resample.py#L3085): [E731](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E731) do not assign a lambda expression, use a def
